summary: This document outlines the KYC (Know Your Customer) details for various individuals and entities associated with Jeffrey Epstein, including account ownership and relationships with Deutsche Bank. It provides insights into the financial activities and connections of Epstein and his associates, including Darren Indyke and Caroline Lang, as well as the entities Prytanee LLC and Southern Trust Company, Inc. This document outlines the financial details and structure of the Pierre Trust, including its grantor, beneficiaries, and estimated financial metrics. It also discusses the relationship with Deutsche Bank and compliance checks related to the trust's financial activities.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the President of Gratitude America and the sole shareholder of Southern Trust Company, Inc. He is involved in opening a checking account for Prytanee LLC.

persons.name: Darren Indyke
persons.context: Darren Indyke is mentioned as a primary contact for the relationship manager and is involved in the establishment of accounts for Prytanee LLC.

persons.name: Caroline Sophie Camille Lang
persons.context: Caroline Lang is identified as the Chairman of Sotheby's and a partner with Epstein in investing in artwork through Prytanee LLC.

persons.name: Etienne Pierre Jean Binant
persons.context: Etienne Binant is mentioned as the manager of Prytanee LLC and is involved in the investment activities of the company.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is the relationship manager at Deutsche Bank who facilitated the opening of accounts for Epstein and his associates.

persons.name: Caroline Lang
persons.context: Caroline Lang is identified as the grantor and trustee of the Pierre Trust, and she is also a beneficiary during her lifetime.

persons.name: Anna Lea Elvire Laik
persons.context: Anna Lea Elvire Laik is mentioned as a beneficiary of the Pierre Trust, set to inherit upon Caroline Lang's death.

persons.name: Rebecca Zoe Berthe Laik
persons.context: Rebecca Zoe Berthe Laik is also mentioned as a beneficiary of the Pierre Trust, alongside her sister Anna Lea Elvire Laik.

persons.name: Cynthia Rodriguez
persons.context: Cynthia Rodriguez is noted for her comments and actions regarding the compliance and documentation of the Pierre Trust.

persons.name: Armen Brash
persons.context: Armen Brash is noted as an approving authority in the document.

persons.name: Gwen Hill
persons.context: Gwen Hill is mentioned as part of the compliance team involved in the trust's documentation.

persons.name: Yoonsun Chung
persons.context: Yoonsun Chung is noted for compliance signatures related to the trust.

connections.description: Darren Indyke works as a lawyer for Jeffrey Epstein and is involved in managing his financial affairs.
Epstein and Lang are partners in Prytanee LLC, investing in artwork together.
Etienne Binant is the manager of Prytanee LLC, which is owned by Epstein.
Indyke and Lang are both involved in the financial activities of Prytanee LLC.
Caroline Lang is the mother and grantor of the Pierre Trust, with Anna Lea Elvire Laik as her daughter and beneficiary.
Caroline Lang is the mother and grantor of the Pierre Trust, with Rebecca Zoe Berthe Laik as her daughter and beneficiary.
Cynthia Rodriguez references Darren Indyke in relation to the trust's compliance and documentation.
Darren Indyke is involved in legal matters related to Jeffrey Epstein and the trust.

events.title: Account Opening Request
events.description: Darren Indyke and Jeffrey Epstein reached out to Stewart Oldfield to open a checking account for Prytanee LLC.

events.title: Account Opening Date
events.description: The checking account for Prytanee LLC was officially opened.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is the sole shareholder of Southern Trust Company, Inc.
Prytanee LLC is co-owned by Southern Trust Company, Inc. and The Pierre Trust.
Caroline Lang is the grantor of The Pierre Trust, which owns 50% of Prytanee LLC.
Darren Indyke is a lawyer and primary contact for the relationship manager at Deutsche Bank.
The document outlines the financial activities and relationships of Epstein and his associates with Deutsche Bank.
The Pierre Trust was incorporated in the US Virgin Islands on 11/21/2016.
Caroline Lang is the grantor and trustee of the Pierre Trust, with her children as beneficiaries.
The trust has estimated gross receipts of $1,000,000 and net profit of $1,000,000 per annum.
Cynthia Rodriguez is involved in compliance checks related to the trust's financial activities.
The document indicates a relationship between the trust and Deutsche Bank, with compliance checks performed.
